name: Horizon Partners
overview:
Horizon Partners is a boutique financial advisory firm serving mid-market companies in the Digital Media, Interactive Marketing, and Software industries.

Horizon provides advisory services to help companies raise capital and execute mergers and acquisitions. We offer every client a comprehensive view of transactional opportunities and a consultative approach to finding and realizing the best possible outcome.

We are specialists, not generalists. We only engage clients when we think our industry knowledge and execution expertise will create significant value.

We prioritize relationships over transactions. We take a long-term approach to helping our clients find the right opportunity to transact. When the timing is appropriate, we combine the intensity of a start-up with the experience of financial industry veterans to achieve exceptional results for our clients.
